fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars

Class Value<Type>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.Value<Type>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CausalValue

    public class Value<Type>
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Value defines a placeholder for the values of atomic HIOA models with a history mechanism that memorise a bounded predefined number of the immediately preceding values.

    Description

    The class is meant to serve as indirection for the value of variables that are shared among the model (unique by rule) that exports them and models that import them. Because variables take different values over the simulation time, a simulation time is attached to each value when it is computed (i.e., when the variable is assigned a new value).

    The class also defines a history mechanism able to memorise values of the variable over time. The size of the history can be set when creating the instance of Value. However, the class does not define any processing for these values. Subclasses should therefore introduce such processing, like means to predict values at a given time, either interpolating between memorised values or extrapolating outside the time interval covered by memorised values.

    Invariant

     invariant       descriptor == null || owner == descriptor.owner
 invariant       timeUnit == null || timeUnit.equals(owner.getSimulatedTimeUnit())
 invariant     time == null || time.getTimeUnit().equals(timeUnit)
 invariant       this.historySize >= 0
 invariant       (this.historySize == 0 ? this.valueHistory == null :	this.valueHistory != null && this.valueHistory.getCurrentSize() >= 0 && this.valueHistory.getCurrentSize() <= this.historySize)

    Created on : 2018-04-03

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Value(AtomicHIOA owner, Type initialValue)
      create a value instance for the given variable and the given owner with an initial value but without history.
      Value(AtomicHIOA owner, Type initialValue, int historySize)
      create a value instance for the given variable and the given owner with an initial value computed at the given initial time and with the given history size.
      Value(AtomicHIOA owner, VariableDescriptor descriptor, Type initialValue, Time initialTime, int historySize)
      create a value instance for the given variable and the given owner and the given variable descriptor with an initial value computed at the given initial time and with the given history size.

         pre     owner != null
 pre     initialTime.getTimeUnit().equals(owner.getSimulatedTimeUnit())
 pre     initialTime.greaterThanOrEqual(Time.zero(timeUnit))
 pre     historySize >= 0

 post  v.equals(initialValue)
 post    time.equals(initialTime)
 post    Value.checkInvariant(this)

      • getValueFromHistory

        public Value<Type> getValueFromHistory(int index)
        get a value in the history at a given index of the sought value, the index 0 giving the newest value, this.getCurrentSizeOfValueHistory() - 1 giving the oldest.

        Contract

         pre     hasValueHistory()
 pre     index >= 0 && index < this.getCurrentSizeOfValueHistory()
 post   true            // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the sought value, 0 is the newest, this.getCurrentSizeOfValueHistory() - 1 is the oldest.
        Returns:
        the value in the history corresponding to index.
